alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 28 at 3:23PM MDT until June 28 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central South Dakota, including the following county, Pennington. * WHEN...Until 630 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 2 inches of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley and Black Hawk.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
